name: Fred O'Mercure
description:
(Google Chrome recommended)

Global Game Jam 2019 Project

(What Home means to you)

- The only place where Freddie really feels home is in the limelight. Help him to stay there!

- Stay alive for the whole song to win

 - Avoid tomatoes, catch roses

- Don't move to much. SING, SING, SING!

CONTROLS

- Left Joystick or Arrows -> Move Freddie

- No button!
